Meteor Shower

game effects

Play this terrain feature immediately revealed. Roll a D6. After that many turns have passed, lay waste to 1 random territory:

  • All cards in that territory are discarded.
  • Any base camps or capitals are removed from the territory.
  • Its geography becomes a wasteland.

See Random Territory Selection in the rule book.

card variation

Terrain Feature

Scarcity

Founder's Deck

History

You just never know when you'll have to take a shower.
